message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your specific needs. Considering its value to you, we're offering it at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope you'll find this within your budget.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. While I recognize the value of the product, $12,000 is a bit steep for my budget. I'd be willing to pay $9,000. What do you say?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value you place on the product, I am willing to negotiate further. How about $10,000 for the product?
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me.  $10,000 is closer, but still a little high for me.  Could you do $9,500?

I'm glad you're finding our offer more appealing, Bob. Considering the value you see in the product, how about we compromise at $9,750? This is the lowest price we can go while still ensuring we cover our costs and maintain profitability.
Alice, you're getting closer to a price I can work with. How about we split the difference and settle at $9,625?
